data.title: LES BAISERS DE SECOURS
data.text:
"The parents of Mathieu, the character I play, are separated. Mathieu understands that he went down the road in the opposite direction. He won his wife back to live with his son. He wants to go down a different road. When you are very young, you are convinced that you will never have any children. It is not good. It is not bad, either. It is just the philosophy of youth. Then one day you have a baby. You betray your own youth, but it is not a choice of quality. One simply does the opposite." (Interview by Thierry Jousse, "Cahiers du Cinéma", n. 415, January, 1989).

Philippe Garrel

Philippe Garrel was born in Boulogne-Billancourt in 1948. He made his first short, Les enfants désaccordés, in 1964 at the age of 16 and quickly stood out for his radical approach to the cinema.

FILMOGRAFIA

Les enfants désaccordés (cm, 1964), Droit de visite (cm, 1965), Anémone (16mm, mm, film Tv, 1966-67), Marie pour mémoire (1967), Actua 1 (realizzazione collettiva, cm, 1968), Le révélateur (1968), La concentration (1968), Le lit de la vierge (1969), La cicatrice intérieure (mm, 1970-71), Athanor (cm, 1972), Les hautes solitudes (1974), Un ange passe (1975), Le berceau de cristal (1975), Voyage au jardin des morts (mm, 1976), Le bleu des origines (mm, 1978), L'enfant secret (1979), Liberté, la nuit (1983), Rue Fontaine (episodio di Paris vu par... vingt-Cinq ans aprés, cm, 1984), Elle a passè tant d'heures sous les sunlights... (1984), Les baisers de secours (1988), J'entends plus la guitare (1991), La naissance de l'amour (1993), Le coeur fantôme (1996).
